attributes.action: Removal of a statues and plaques commemorating or supporting a terrorist or terrorist act.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned would ask the government to put in legislation preventing the creation  of plaques, statues or any other memorial that supports or commemorate a terrorist or terrorist act. We ask that all existing plaques, statues or existing memorials are removed/dismantled.

An example of such an item is the recent plaque that was unveiled in Northern Ireland on the Shankhill Road.
